                <a class="navigation__link navigation__link--level2" href="/c/nav-filtre/connectique?aggregationtype_facette_utilisation_connectique_____concatener_oui~and%7Cfacette_utilisation_connectique_____concatener_oui~te9le9vision202d20vide9o" data-tracking-action="clicStandard" data-category-id="454b1e3d-7aae-4f05-ad06-0791a95477cf" tabindex="-1" data-analytics_action="clic" data-analytics_category="burger_menu" data-analytics_label="tv_-_image_-_son||connectique_video">

    <script>
  const carouselArray = document.querySelectorAll('bl-carousel');
  for(const car of carouselArray) {
    const location = car.getAttribute('data-location');
    const id = location + '-skeleton';
    const skeleton = document.getElementById(id);
    car.addEventListener('componentLoaded', () => {
      skeleton.style.opacity= 0;
      car.style.opacity = 1;
      skeleton.style.display = 'none';
      car.style.display = 'block';
    });
  }
</script>
